meaningMnemonic: The <radical>thread</radical> that goes through <radical>Korea</radical> is the <kanji>latitude</kanji> line splitting up North and South Korea.
readingMnemonic: The only way you can see this <kanji>latitude</kanji> line is to ride an <reading>ea</reading>gle (い) over it. The line isn't visible from a car, you're too close, and a plane is too high. You have to see it from an eagle's point of view.
